import React from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import Cards from "./Cards"; import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; const Home = () => { const history = useHistory(); const [search, setSearch] = React.useState(""); const handleSearchChange = (e) => { setSearch(e.target.value); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); history.push(`/search/${search}`); }; const [movies, setMovies] = React.useState([]); React.useEffect(() => { axios .get("/api/movies/popular") .then((info) => info.data) .then((res) => setMovies(res.results)); }, []); return ( <> <>

Bienvenido a la red de peliculas m√°s grande del mundo

{movies.map((data, i) => { return ; })} ); }; export default Home;
